name: leaflet-test
description: Leaflet plugin for testing your own custom plugin.

scripts.test-web-gubu: npm run build && npm run build-web && browserify -i util -o test/web.js -e test/entry.js -im && see test/web.html
scripts.build-web-gubu: cp gubu.js gubu.max.js && browserify -i util -o gubu.max.js -e gubu.web.js -s Gubu -i
scripts.test-web: npm run build-web && browserify -i util -o spec/web.js -e spec/entry.js -im && see spec/web.html
scripts.build-web: cp src/leaflet-test.js src/leaflet-test.max.js && browserify -i util -o src/leaflet-test.max.js -e src/leaflet-test.web.js -s Leaflet.Test -i

author: RÃ­ona Stokes (https://github.com/rionastokes)
